P:Autodesk.Revit.UI.Macros.UIMacroManage.title: UIMacroManager.IsValidObject Property
P:Autodesk.Revit.UI.Macros.UIMacroManage.desc: Specifies whether the .NET object represents a valid Revit entity.
P:Autodesk.Revit.UI.Macros.UIMacroManage.remarks: If the corresponding Revit native object is destroyed, or creation of the corresponding object is undone, a managed API object containing it is no longer valid. API methods cannot be called on invalidated wrapper objects.
